TERMS AND CONDITIONS
1.GST ADDITIONAL
2.COST QUOTED IS ONLY FOR PERIODIC MAINTENANCE
3.IF ANY SPARES FOUND TO BE DAMAGED DURING THE SERVICE, THE SAME SHALL BE SUPPLIED ON CHARGED BASIS SUBJECT TO AVAILABILITY AND A MINIMUM OF 8 WEEKS LEAD TIME
4.THE CLAIM OF WARRANTY OF PRODUCTS WHICH IS NOT SUPPLIED BY US SHALL BE SUBJECT TO THE OEM APPROVAL
5.INCASE OF FAULTY COMPONENTS WHICH IS OUT OF WARRANTY AND COULD BE SERVICED BY OEM SHALL BE CHARGED ADDITIONALLY
6.PROVISION OF LADDERS/LIFTS FOR WORK AT HEIGHT ABOVE 5' FROM GROUND LEVEL SHALL BE YOUR SCOPE
7.WORK TO BE CARRIED UNDER AMC AS PER THE SCOPE OF WORK
8.WE SHALL NOT BE LET RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY DIRECT OR INDIRECT LOSS CAUSED DUE TO THE SERVICE
9.PAYMENT TO BE MADE AFTER EACH SERVICE ON SUBMISSION OF INVOICE
10.INCASE OF ANY TECHNICAL SUPPORT REQUIRED FOR OEM AUTHORISED ENGINEER, THE SAME SHALL BE CHARGED ON ADDITIONALLY
11.INCASE OF FAULT IN PANEL/DEVICES, NO SPARE DEVICE SHALL BE SUPPLIED TILL THE SERVICE OR REPLACEMENT IS DONE
12.COMMISSIONING OF NEWLY SUPPLIED SPARES SHALL BE ON ADDITIONAL CHARGED BASIS IF THE SAME REQUIRES OEM AUTHORISED ENGINEER
